Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local planeObject = Tool.Plane local plane = Tool.Plane.Value local velocityConstant = Tool.VelocityConstant.Value local player = nil
local smoke = Instance.new("Smoke")
local maxForwardSpeed = 60 local maxReverseSpeed = -40
function killSmoke() smoke.Parent = nil plane.squealTires.Looped = false plane.squealTires:Stop() end
planeObject.Changed:connect(function() plane = Tool.Plane.Value player.PlayerGui.PaperPlaneGui.MainFrame.ThrowPlane.TXT.Text = "End Flight" Tool.CamFocus.Value = plane plane.Fly.maxForce = Vector3.new(4000, 0, 4000) plane.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) plane.Fly.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) plane.Turn.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) while plane do velocityConstant = Tool.VelocityConstant.Value plane.Fly.velocity = velocityConstant * plane.CFrame.lookVector.unit plane.idleSound.Volume = 1 * math.abs(velocityConstant/(maxForwardSpeed/2)) plane.idleSound.Pitch = (math.abs(velocityConstant/(maxForwardSpeed/2)) * 2) + 1 plane.Bank.maxTorque = Vector3.new(40000, 0, 40000) local cf = plane.CFrame plane.Bank.cframe = CFrame.new(cf.p, cf.p+Vector3.new(cf.lookVector.x, 0, cf.lookVector.z))*CFrame.fromEulerAnglesXYZ(0, 0, plane.RotVelocity.y*0.5)
if player.PlayerGui.PaperPlaneGui.MainFrame.Gas.Selected and player.PlayerGui.PaperPlaneGui.MainFrame.Brake.Selected then smoke.Parent = plane plane.squealTires.Volume = 1 plane.squealTires.Looped = true plane.squealTires:Play() else delay(2,killSmoke) end wait() end
end)
function onEquipped() player = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Tool.Parent) end
function onUnequipped() player = nil end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

--clean up the plane if the creator leaves if script.Parent.creator.Value then game.Players.ChildRemoved:connect(function(p) if script.Parent.creator.Value.Parent == nil then script.Parent.Parent:remove() end end) end

--refocus the camera on the player if the tool is dropped (the localscript in the tool stoips working in the case, so this script must be in the character or backpack)
--avoid error, script runs before script.Tool and script.Target are added as children wait() script.Tool.Value.Changed:connect(function(pr) --print("Tool \"", script.Tool.Value, "\"s parent changed to ", script.Tool.Value.Parent) if pr == "Parent" then if script.Tool.Value.Parent == game.Workspace then game.Workspace.CurrentCamera.CameraType = 5 game.Workspace.CurrentCamera.CameraSubject = script.Target.Value end end end)
script.Tool.Value.Unequipped:connect(function() wait(0.5) script:remove() end)
print("PaperPlaneGear :: CamFocusFailsafe loaded")

wait(0.5) script.Parent.CamFocus.Changed:connect(function() local o = script.Parent.CamFocus.Value if o then wait() game.Workspace.CurrentCamera.CameraType = 1 game.Workspace.CurrentCamera.CameraSubject = o else wait() game.Workspace.CurrentCamera.CameraType = 5 game.Workspace.CurrentCamera.CameraSubject = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Character.Humanoid end end)
local mouseCon = nil
local startSound = Instance.new("Sound") startSound.Name = "startSound" startSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=31245452" startSound:Play()
local idleSound = Instance.new("Sound") idleSound.Name = "idleSound" idleSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=31245465" idleSound.Looped = true idleSound:Play()
local hardStopSound = Instance.new("Sound") hardStopSound.Name = "hardStopSound" hardStopSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=31245495" hardStopSound:Play()
local squealTires = hardStopSound:clone() squealTires.Name = "squealTires" squealTires.Looped = true
function CreatePlane()
--This call will cause a "wait" until the data comes back local root = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(31184482)
local instances = root:GetChildren() if #instances == 0 then root:Remove() return nil end
root = root:FindFirstChild("RCCar") root.Name = "RCCar"
startSound.Parent = root idleSound.Parent = root hardStopSound.Parent = root squealTires.Parent = root
return root
end
local dropped = false local equipped = false local gui = nil local player = nil local velocityConstant = 0 local gasDown = false local brakeDown = false local plane = nil
--local smoke = Instance.new("Smoke")
local friction = 0.97 local maxForwardSpeed = 60 local maxReverseSpeed = -40
local keyUp = nil local keyDown = nil
script.Parent.Changed:connect(function(pr) if pr == "Parent" then if script.Parent.Parent == game.Workspace then --dropped dropped = true script.Parent.Handle.CanCollide = true elseif dropped then dropped = false script.Parent.Handle.CanCollide = false end end end)
function killSmoke() smoke.Parent = nil squealTires.Looped = false squealTires:Stop() end
script.Parent.Equipped:connect(function(mouse)
script.Parent.Handle.Float.force = Vector3.new(0, 392, 0) equipped = true player = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(script.Parent.Parent) gui = script.Parent.PaperPlaneGui:clone() gui.Parent = player.PlayerGui -- enable failsafe wait() --needed, strange error occurs when no wait is put here local fail = script.Parent.CamFocusFailsafe:clone() fail.Disabled = false fail.Tool.Value = script.Parent fail.Target.Value = player.Character.Humanoid --put in character fail.Parent = script.Parent.Parent --- local turnpressed = false --- mouseCon = gui.MainFrame.ThrowPlane.MouseButton1Down:connect(function() if plane then plane.Parent = nil plane = nil player.Character.Torso.Anchored = false if keyUp then keyUp:disconnect() end if keyDown then keyDown:disconnect() end else plane = CreatePlane() player.Character.Torso.Anchored = true plane.AncestryChanged:connect(function(child,parent) if parent == nil then player.Character.Torso.Humanoid.Anchored = false if keyUp then keyUp:disconnect() end if keyDown then keyDown:disconnect() end plane = nil end end)
velocityConstant = 0 gasDown = false brakeDown = false
plane.Parent = game.Workspace startSound:Play() do plane.Position = script.Parent.Handle.Position + (-script.Parent.Handle.CFrame.lookVector * 5) local cf = script.Parent.Handle.CFrame plane.CFrame = CFrame.new(plane.Position, plane.Position + Vector3.new(-cf.lookVector.x, 0, -cf.lookVector.z)) end local pplane = plane -- keyDown = mouse.KeyDown:connect(onKeyDown) keyUp = mouse.KeyUp:connect(onKeyUp) script.Parent.Plane.Value = plane idleSound:Play()
while plane do script.Parent.VelocityConstant.Value = velocityConstant velocityConstant = velocityConstant * friction wait() end
if not equipped then return end script.Parent.CamFocus.Value = nil gui.MainFrame.ThrowPlane.TXT.Text = "Throw Plane" end end) end)
function onKeyDown(key) key:lower() if key == "w" then gasDown = true gui.MainFrame.Gas.Selected = true while gasDown do if velocityConstant < maxForwardSpeed then velocityConstant = velocityConstant + 0.8 end wait(0.03) end elseif key == "s" then brakeDown = true gui.MainFrame.Brake.Selected = true if velocityConstant > 0 and plane.Velocity.magnitude > 5 then hardStopSound.Volume = 1 * math.abs(velocityConstant/maxForwardSpeed) hardStopSound:Play() end while brakeDown do if velocityConstant > maxReverseSpeed then velocityConstant = velocityConstant - 0.8 end wait(0.03) end elseif key == "a" then if plane then plane.Turn.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(0, plane.Turn.angularvelocity.y + 1.2, 0) gui.MainFrame.TurnLeft.Selected = true end elseif key == "d" then if plane then plane.Turn.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(0, plane.Turn.angularvelocity.y - 1.2, 0) gui.MainFrame.TurnRight.Selected = true end end
end
function onKeyUp(key) key:lower() if key == "w" then gui.MainFrame.Gas.Selected = false gasDown = false elseif key == "s" then gui.MainFrame.Brake.Selected = false brakeDown = false elseif key == "a"then if plane then gui.MainFrame.TurnLeft.Selected = false plane.Turn.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(0, plane.Turn.angularvelocity.y - 1.2, 0) end elseif key == "d" then if plane then gui.MainFrame.TurnRight.Selected = false plane.Turn.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(0, plane.Turn.angularvelocity.y + 1.2, 0) end end end
script.Parent.Unequipped:connect(function() player.Character.Torso.Anchored = false if keyUp then keyUp:disconnect() end if keyDown then keyDown:disconnect() end if mouseCon then mouseCon:disconnect() end equipped = false if plane then plane.Parent = nil plane = nil end script.Parent.CamFocus.Value = nil if gui then gui:remove() gui = nil end end)

local Tool = script.Parent local planeObject = Tool.Plane local plane = Tool.Plane.Value local velocityConstant = Tool.VelocityConstant.Value local player = nil
local smoke = Instance.new("Smoke")
local maxForwardSpeed = 60 local maxReverseSpeed = -40
function killSmoke() smoke.Parent = nil plane.squealTires.Looped = false plane.squealTires:Stop() end
planeObject.Changed:connect(function() plane = Tool.Plane.Value player.PlayerGui.PaperPlaneGui.MainFrame.ThrowPlane.TXT.Text = "End Flight" Tool.CamFocus.Value = plane plane.Fly.maxForce = Vector3.new(4000, 0, 4000) plane.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) plane.Fly.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) plane.Turn.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) while plane do velocityConstant = Tool.VelocityConstant.Value plane.Fly.velocity = velocityConstant * plane.CFrame.lookVector.unit plane.idleSound.Volume = 1 * math.abs(velocityConstant/(maxForwardSpeed/2)) plane.idleSound.Pitch = (math.abs(velocityConstant/(maxForwardSpeed/2)) * 2) + 1 plane.Bank.maxTorque = Vector3.new(40000, 0, 40000) local cf = plane.CFrame plane.Bank.cframe = CFrame.new(cf.p, cf.p+Vector3.new(cf.lookVector.x, 0, cf.lookVector.z))*CFrame.fromEulerAnglesXYZ(0, 0, plane.RotVelocity.y*0.5)
if player.PlayerGui.PaperPlaneGui.MainFrame.Gas.Selected and player.PlayerGui.PaperPlaneGui.MainFrame.Brake.Selected then smoke.Parent = plane plane.squealTires.Volume = 1 plane.squealTires.Looped = true plane.squealTires:Play() else delay(2,killSmoke) end wait() end
end)
function onEquipped() player = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Tool.Parent) end
function onUnequipped() player = nil end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
